Reviews.Content: Want more room at Alam Kul Kul........ Have stayed at Alam Kul Kul on (now) 7 occasions.Usually stayed in Alam rooms, but on this occasion in Alam Villas.These are single bedroom units.Double and twin beds available.We were 7 persons, utilising 4 villas.The extra space in the villas makes for a more pleasant stay.Some units have , as well as an internal shower, 'external' shower and bath facilities, great fun. Villas facing the small pool and along the walkway directly from these rooms , afford a quieter atmosphere. All in all, excellent and would certainly stay again in villas.
Reviews.Author: wayanB
